body_html:
@smsrikanthreddy Did you find something in /tensorflow/BUILD file:
in deps segment of cc_binary whose name=libtensorflow.so, there's no deps about contrib.
However, in /tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD, there exist something about contrib.
So we use python, can use tf.contrib; but cannot use contrib.op when use lib
body_text:
@smsrikanthreddy Did you find something in /tensorflow/BUILD file:
in deps segment of cc_binary whose name=libtensorflow.so, there's no deps about contrib.
However, in /tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD, there exist something about contrib.
So we use python, can use tf.contrib; but cannot use contrib.op when use lib
body:
@smsrikanthreddy Did you find something in /tensorflow/BUILD file:
in `deps` segment of `cc_binary` whose `name=libtensorflow.so`, there's no deps about contrib.
However, in /tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD, there exist something about `contrib`.
So we use python, can use `tf.contrib`; but cannot use `contrib.op` when use lib
